column1: Uchi////Went to uchi to celebrate our honeymoon with my wife. Our waitress was Veronica and she was on par with our entire experience: absolutely incredible. We couldn't decide what we wanted so Veronica brought us a few things the chef recommended. Since she knew it was our honeymoon
column2: she brought us a gift from the chef
column3: a plate of something delicious that I can't remember. As we were leaving Veronica sent us home with an Uchi cookbook
column4: signed by all the staff congratulating us. It was a wonderful
column5: touching experience and I can't recommend this place enough.
